title: ITR Filing Before Sept. 15 Deadline: Step-By-Step Guide To Using AI Tax Advisors
description: These days, filing taxes has been made easier with the availability of a wide range of services. These include conventional chartered accountants or the online platforms offering tax filing services. A third option is also gaining popularity when it comes to handling finances: the use of artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
content:
As the Sept. 15 deadline to file income tax returns for financial year 2024-25 approaches, now is the time to gather all the necessary documents to ensure your ITR is filed on time, if you haven’t done it already.

title: Larry Ellison beats Elon Musk in billionaire's game. Is Oracle ready to dethrone Tesla from the world's top 10 list?
description: Larry Ellison, the Oracle founder, briefly surpassed Elon Musk to become the world's richest person. This happened after Oracle shares surged, increasing the company's market value significantly. Oracle's rise is due to promising forecasts for its cloud infrastructure revenue. The company has also secured major deals in the artificial intelligence sector. This shift highlights the dynamic nature of wealth rankings.
content: Larry Ellison briefly overtook Elon Musk as the world’s richest man on Wednesday after a historic rally in Oracle Corp shares added $244 billion to the software giant’s market value. The surge pushed Oracle closer to the $1 trillion mark and fueled s... [5056 chars]

title: Empowering Educators: Unveiling AI's Role in Modern Classrooms
description: Artificial intelligence in education is evolving rapidly, outpacing current schools' and universities' preparedness. Informal learning networks spread AI knowledge among students and teachers, but lack depth and focus on ethical issues. Structured professional development for educators is crucial to fostering critical engagement and effective AI integration.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is swiftly transforming educational landscapes, impacting how students write essays, practice languages, and complete assignments. Teachers are also delving into AI utilization for planning lessons and grading. However, a... [777 chars]

title: AI tools can help, but they can also cause trouble. What advisors need to know.
description: Brokerages and RIA firms are quickly integrating artificial intelligence in their practices, often pushed by next-gen advisors and clients.
content:
A few wealth advisory firms have already gotten into trouble for “AI washing," the practice of overstating the role that AI is playing in their businesses.
All this is happening in a murky regulatory landscape. A few firms have already gotten into tr... [5726 chars]

title: Asian Shares Are Mostly up After US Stocks Inch to More Records as Inflation Slows and Oracle Soars
description: MANILA, Philippines (AP) — Asian shares were mostly higher Thursday, buoyed by gains of tech-related stocks after Wall Street inched to more records following a surprisingly encouraging report on inflation and a stunning forecast for growth from Oracle because of the artificial intelligence boom.

title: ‘Only around 28% companies are scaling up AI in a big way’, says Sandip Patel, Managing Director, IBM India

title: Multinational Equifax establishes its first AI Innovation Lab outside the US in Wexford
description: With AI (artificial intelligence) already becoming an increasingly important factor in our daily lives, global credit reporting, data and analytics company Equifax has officially launched its first AI Innovation Lab outside of the US at its operation in Wexford.

title: In AI-simulated Fed meeting, political pressure polarises board
description: A simulated Federal Reserve meeting that used artificial intelligence agents modeled on real-life policymakers showed political pressure polarised members of the board in their rate-setting deliberations.
content:

title: AI rollout in NHS hospitals faces major challenges
description: Implementing artificial intelligence (AI) into NHS hospitals is far harder than initially anticipated, with complications around governance, contracts, data collection, harmonisation with old IT systems, finding the right AI tools and staff training, finds a major new UK study led by UCL researchers.
content: Implementing artificial intelligence (AI) into NHS hospitals is far harder than initially anticipated, with complications around governance, contracts, data collection, harmonisation with old IT systems, finding the right AI tools and staff training,... [6901 chars]
